tal:block.p: Creative Commons, Warner Bros. Records, and Machine Shop Recordings are proud to present the Fort Minor Remix Contest. Fort Minor is offering the separated audio elements of "Remember the Name" online under a Creative Commons BY-NC license, so that producers all over the world can easily create remixes of the hit song.

All eligible entries have now been received, Fort Minor's Mike Shinoda will choose a winning remix. The producer of the winning remix will be awarded a new Technics SL-1200MK5 turntable, courtesy of Warner Bros. Records and Machine Shop Recordings.
The contest entries included the vocal track from "Remember the Name." You can download the album version of "Remember the Name" for free by visiting Fort Minor's MySpace page.

div.div: Fort Minor is a hip-hop project fronted by Linkin Park vocalist/ guitarist/keyboardist Mike Shinoda. Fort Minor's debut album, The Rising Tied was executive produced by Jay-Z and features Styles of Beyond, Common, John Legend, Black Thought of The Roots, and Holly Brook. To hear Fort Minor's music, visit the group's MySpace page. For information about Warner Bros. Records artists and releases, visit the label's Web site.

tal:block.div: The contest is closed to new entries.
